channel.title: CVE Feed for Panasonic -- Control FPWIN Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Panasonic -- Control FPWIN Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-6315|2024-08-02T08:28:20.386Z -- panasonic -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: Out-of-bouds read vulnerability in FPWin Pro version 7.7.0.0 and all previous versions may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted project file.

item.title: CVE-2023-6314|2024-08-02T08:28:21.055Z -- panasonic -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in FPWin Pro version 7.7.0.0 and all previous versions may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted project file.

item.title: CVE-2023-28728|2024-08-02T13:43:23.896Z -- panasonic -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in Panasonic Control FPWIN Pro versions 7.6.0.3 and all previous versions may allow arbitrary code execution when opening specially crafted project files.

item.title: CVE-2023-28729|2024-08-02T13:43:23.945Z -- panasonic -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: A type confusion vulnerability in Panasonic Control FPWIN Pro versions 7.6.0.3 and all previous versions may allow arbitrary code execution when opening specially crafted project files.

item.title: CVE-2023-28730|2024-08-02T13:43:23.736Z -- panasonic -- control%20fpwin%20pro
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability Panasonic Control FPWIN Pro versions 7.6.0.3 and all previous versions may allow arbitrary code execution when opening specially crafted project files.
